body: what do u think of mainstream music i personally think its kinda overrated tbh im just curious what the world thinks about it
body_tagged: what do u think of mainstream music i personally think its kinda overrated tbh im just curious what the world thinks about it
title: mainstream music

replies.body:
Personally, I don't listen to today's current music [like Taylor Swift or any of the popular artists in our world today] I think they are just, trash.
To be honest music in this day in age is going down, it's declining...

"i personally think its kinda overrated tbh"
All in all, I agree with you.

replies.body:
Cookin' up dope with a Uzi (blaow)

also how is music declining or going down (beneath!) you guys are just hating on Tay Tay for no reason lol. Migos is basically dropping a classic every year (annual!).

replies.body: People who say modern music is terrible don't dig deep enough. You can find some amazing gems, and there are already quite a few amazing mainstream bands like Imagine Dragons and Breaking Benjamin. Majority of what you'll hear on the radio will probably suck, sure, but there are some great things out there.
